patthana15.34:4.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.34:5.1: Āsavasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.34:6.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naāsavasampayutto naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
